name: Rose Tyler
description: A shop assistant from London who became one of the Doctor's most important friends.

name: Donna Noble
description: The "best temp in Chiswick" who became the Doctor-Donna, a human-Time Lord metacrisis.

name: Amy Pond
description: "The girl who waited," she met the Doctor as a child and traveled with him as an adult.

name: Clara Oswald
description: The "Impossible Girl," she was scattered throughout the Doctor's timeline, saving him many times.

name: Sarah Jane Smith
description: An intrepid investigative journalist who became one of the Doctor's most beloved and long-serving friends.

name: Romana
description: A fellow Time Lord (or Time Lady) assigned to help the Fourth Doctor, she even regenerated into a new form during her travels.

name: Ace
description: A troubled teenager from London with a talent for creating explosives ('Nitro-9'), she was a more action-oriented companion for the Seventh Doctor.

name: Martha Jones
description: A brilliant medical student who saved the world by walking the Earth for a year, telling the story of the Doctor.

name: Rory Williams
description: Amy Pond's loyal husband, a nurse who waited 2,000 years for her as a Roman Auton. 'The Last Centurion'.

name: Bill Potts
description: A curious and sharp-witted canteen worker who became the Twelfth Doctor's student and traveling companion.
